description: Styles for buttons in the UI component, including base styles, primary, secondary button styles, and states such as active and focus.

classes.name: ui-btn
classes.description: Base class for button styling, including borders, padding, font properties, and background gradients.

classes.name: ui-btn-primary
classes.description: Class for primary button styling, overriding background and text color for prominence.

classes.name: ui-btn-secondary
classes.description: Class for secondary button styling, providing an alternative color scheme.
